content.webTitle: Comedy preview: Elizabeth & Raleigh: Late But Live, On tour

fields.headline: Comedy preview: Elizabeth & Raleigh: Late But Live, On tour
fields.bodyText: With two of the best British stand-ups of the 1990s behind it - Simon Munnery and Stewart Lee - on paper this production should be a winner. And, on paper, it probably was. Sadly, though, it never quite hits the heights despite the brain power behind it. Based on Raleigh's courtship of Elizabeth - a relationship better covered in comedy terms by Blackadder - the charming Miles Jupp (Raleigh) stars alongside Munnery (Elizabeth). This is an unfinished show rather than a bad one and definitely worth a look. • Eden Court Theatre, Inverness, Sun 26; New Wolsey Theatre, Ipswich, Tue 28; Royal Theatre, Northampton, Wed 29
